name: 洪英傑
objective:
分析化學包含物質組成的分離，確認與測定。定性分析旨在化學確認物質之物種，定量分析則在測定其含量。分離操作步驟在定性與定量分析中通常是必要的.
Analytical chemistry involes separating, identifying, and determining the relative amounts of the components in a sample of matter. Qualitative analysis is concerned with the chemical identify of the species in the sample and quantitative analysis is concerned with to mearsure the relative amounts of the components in a sample.A separation step is usually a necessary part of both a qualitative and a quantitative analysis.
schedule:
第一週	02/20	Basic Introduction
第二週	02/27	Experimental Error/Statistics
第三週	03/06	Statistics
第四週	03/13	Chemical Equilibrium Titrimetry
第五週	03/20	Gravimetric Analysis
第六週	03/27	Titrations I
第七週	04/03	Titrations II
第八週	04/10	Titrations III
第九週	04/17	Midterm
第十週	04/24	Electrode Potentials
第十一週	04/31	Potentiometry
第十二週	05/08	Electrochemistry I
第十三週	05/19	Electrochemistry II
第十四週	05/22	Spectrophometry 
第十五週	05/29	Atomic Spectroscopy
第十六週	06/05	Final Exam
第十七週	06/12	Final score check
materials: 1.	Holler and Skoog et al., “Fundamentals of Analytical Chemistry ”
